players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Sad to see Diana go, but we need to focus. Charlie, Alice, any initial thoughts on who the mafia might be?"
You: "It's too early to say for sure, but we should all share our thoughts. Bob, why did you single out Charlie and me?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia. I have proof from last night’s investigation. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafia, and I have solid evidence from my investigation. We cannot afford to hesitate—voting him out now is the only way to protect the town."
You: "I believe Charlie is the detective and his investigation is credible. We should vote Bob out immediately."
Bob: "I am the detective, I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. Charlie is lying to frame me!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
